flawed_nl_solution:
They scored an average of 720/24=<<720/24=30>>30 points in their previous games
Half that many would be 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 points
So in the finals, they scored 15-2=<<15-2=12>>12 points
Their opponent thus scored 12-2=<<12-2=10>>10 points
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
